name: Capital Pains
description:
My Entry for OpenDoresGaming 2D Game Jam.

Capital Pains is a top down 2D shooter were bullets are currency. Or is currency bullets? Who knows, or really cares. At the the beginning of each dungeon crawl you will be given a number of bullets, and you can spend what you save at the store for upgrades.

This is a very simple game. If I'd budgeted my time better I probably could have added some variety to the missions, included some more upgrades and polished it a little more, but I think it works as a proof of concept type thing, and its what I have.

Shop is on the left, missions are started at the billboard on the right.

Terrible music and worse art by me.
